Wrath: I don't really know......Damn... I never plan ahead! Hmm...I haven't=
 been aound for to long...Hmm... *Wrath continues thinking of something to =
do*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:19 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

=

  Deemos and Inzola walk to the jungle with Wrath.

  "Who are we hunting?=
" Deemos asked...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizar=
ds 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:08 AM
 =
   Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Wrath begins walking for the jungle*
=
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:02 AM
      Subject: Re: =
Neo Beast Wars


      "Yes, let's go." Inzola said to Wrath...
        ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:53 AM
        Subjec=
t: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        Wrath: We could try jungle? *Wrath asks Dee=
mos*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
     =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:39 A=
M
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          "It's up to you where w=
e start." Deemos said to Wrath...
            ----- Original Message ----- =

            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
   =
         Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:27 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo=
 Beast Wars


            *Wrath nods and smiles* Wrath: Where should start=
? *Wrath asks Inzola and Deemos*
              ----- Original Message -----=
 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
              Subject: Re: Ne=
o Beast Wars


              "Hunting? We hunted down almost everyone alrea=
dy, but sure, we'll come." Inzola said.

              "Good to practice wi=
th our new beast modes." Deemos said. He patted Wrath on the shoulder.

   =
           "Those Alliance and Preds will be sorry they wouldn't let us joi=
n!" Deemos said. Inzola looked at Wrath.

              "The Maximals, most=
 of them just don't got it, but a few stand out, you are one of those few."=
 Inzola said to Wrath...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
            From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
                Subje=
ct: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                *Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well......We=
 can go scouting...hmm....I've haven't had much to do...We go hunting? *Wra=
th asks Deemos and Inzola*
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
=
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
                  S=
ubject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  Inzola smiles and shakes Wra=
th's hand.

                  "Nice to meet such a charming and powerful bo=
t upon my repair." Inzola said. Deemos and Inzola hugged for about 5 second=
s and then looked back to Wrath.

                  "So, what are we suppos=
ed to do right now?" Deemos asked Wrath...
                    ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
                    From: ilovealllizards 
              =
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Saturday, July 22, =
2000 12:53 AM
                    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


           =
         Wrath: I am Wrath and you must be the Inzola that Deemos spoke abo=
ut. A pleasure to meet you. *Wrath extends his hand for a hand shake*
     =
                 ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: =
THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    =
  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM
                      Subject: Neo=
 Beast Wars


                      Deemos looked at the CR Chamber when it=
 beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

                      "Maximal=
 base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laughed.

            =
          "Who are you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

                      Gangon'=
s spark is still waiting.

                      Artist runs around in a ci=
rcle, playing his stupid games he believed exercises him. He runs away from=
 the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into the mountain and an avala=
nche starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts pass through his mind. Hou=
rs later, he awakes.

                      "Oh, that was some blow, but I'=
ll go with the flow." Artist said.

                      "Plintissa? Where=
 are you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He remember=
ed that she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were working, so h=
e ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

                   =
   "Plintissa dear? You don't remember me? For me death was near." Artist s=
aid. Plintissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arms. Artist laugh=
ed and they kissed. After the kiss.

                      "Do me a favor, =
Artist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

              =
        "Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll have a good time! Oops!" Artist said. T=
hey both laughed and Artist took Plintissa to a grassy plain.

            =
          Dracona held up her scanning device in front of Scorponok's face.=


                      "I can find that device I lost." Dracona said.

   =
                   "Then I'll give it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my =
blaster, it is an ice gun." Dracona said. She looked at Scorponok with big =
beautiful eyes. Sinister and Sinesis stared at her, mouths agape.

        =
              The Radicons sat there still...
